scripts.info:
echo 'INFO:
 Repo: https://github.com/nathanbuckley/nathanbuckley.github.io#readme
 author: nathanbuckley
 license: ISC'
scripts.lintalljs:
echo '=====> linting all the JS <======
' && jshint js/*.js
scripts.minmaincss:
echo '=====> minify main.css <======
' && cleancss css/main.css -o css/main.min.css
scripts.minmodalcss:
echo '=====> minify modal.css <======
'&& cleancss css/modal.css -o css/modal.min.css
scripts.minmainjs:
echo '=====> minify main.js <======
' && uglifyjs js/main.js -o js/main.min.js --verbose --timings
scripts.build:
echo '~~~ =====> Running Build Sequance <====== ~~~
' && npm run minmaincss -s && npm run minmodalcss -s && npm run minmainjs -s
